title: Biden's Piiiiiissed, Jake Paul Suuuucks 12.22.21
itunes:title: Biden's Piiiiiissed, Jake Paul Suuuucks 12.22.21
description:
In episode 1055, Jack and guest co-host Jody Avirgan are joined by actor, comedian, and podcaster Carl Tart to discuss Biden Admin Issues Plainly Worded, Openly Frustrated Statement on Omicron, ESPN Declares 2021 Jake Paul’s Year, What the Hell is Masterclass, Anyway and more!

  1. Biden Admin Issues Plainly Worded, Openly Frustrated Statement on Omicron
  2. Biden admin eyes a potentially stark shift in messaging around ending the pandemic
  3. ESPN Declares 2021 Jake Paul’s Year
  4. MasterClass just raised $100 million for celebrity-fueled content
  5. The Company That Took Over YouTube Pre-Rolls Just Got a Pile of Money
  6. What MasterClass Online Courses Pay to Lure Hollywood Stars as Teachers
  7. Kevin Spacey’s Online Acting Course Pulled by MasterClass


Listen: This Day In Esoteric Political History

Listen: Train Song by Vashti Bunyan

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
